Original: 老闆娘非常好，很有耐心，推薦的酒款都不錯，價格也是公道，會是回購首選店家
EN: The boss is very good, very patient, the recommended wine is good, the price is also fair, it will be the first choice store for repurchase

Original: 偶然在這家店找到常喝的平價紅酒，來店裡順便請老闆推薦幾瓶，今天搬不動，下次再來買
EN: Occasionally, I found cheap red wines that I drink often in this shop. When I came to the store, I asked the boss to recommend a few bottles. I can't move today. I will buy it next time

Original:
酒種齊全
價格平實

我是炸豬排套餐的常客
好吃！
EN:
I am a frequent visitor to fried pork chop package
tasty!
The boss is very good and kind
The boss is kind, so good to teeth

Original: 一個讓人懷念以前的地方
EN: A place that makes people miss the past
